name: The Icely Palace
description:
This is a massive custom level for the game Lingo and requires you have that game to install the map.

This level explores a massive amount of design space in word game mechanics and has 25+ hours of content in it. It requires knowledge of the Lingo base game and its color ruleset.

Featuring wildcards, new side markings, checkerboards, and more.

Ice Indoctrination + To The Top Edition

  • Over 1000 panels
  • Every area in Lingo is now different and larger than the base game
  • Much longer playtime (uh, including the loading time)
  • New mechanics and extensions to underexplored base game mechanics

More info about Lingo and this custom map is here:
